sentences.en: a resolution to impose sanctions (= start using sanctions ) on DPRK
sentences.cn: 对朝鲜实施制裁的决议

sentences.en: Any talk about lifting sanctions (= ending them ) is premature.
sentences.cn: 现时就谈取消制裁为时过早。

sentences.en: Apparently, the aide had acted without White House sanction.
sentences.cn: 这名助理的所作所为显然未经过白宫的批准。

sentences.en: As an ultimate sanction, they can sell their shares.
sentences.cn: 作为最高的处罚，他们可以出售他们的股份。

sentences.en: He may now be ready to sanction the use of force.
sentences.cn: 他现在可能打算批准使用武力。

sentences.en: He seemed to be preparing to sanction an increase in public borrowing.
sentences.cn: 他似乎正准备批准增加公共贷款。

sentences.en: How can you sanction such rudeness?
sentences.cn: 你怎么会准许这种粗鲁的行为 呢 ?

sentences.en: I can't sanction your methods.
sentences.cn: 我不能同意你的办法.

sentences.en: Is prison the best sanction against a crime like this?
sentences.cn: 为遏止这类罪行,监禁手段是否是上策?

sentences.en: Nixon and Rogers implored them to withhold the sanction.
sentences.cn: 尼克松和罗杰斯规劝他们不要把事情做绝.

sentences.en: Official sanction has not yet been given.
sentences.cn: 尚未获得正式批准.

sentences.en: Prison is the best sanction against a crime like this.
sentences.cn: 为遏止这类罪行,监禁手段是上策.

sentences.en: The church refused to sanction the king’s second marriage.
sentences.cn: 教会拒绝批准国王的第二次婚姻。

sentences.en: The custom will never receive the sanction of tradition.
sentences.cn: 那种风俗绝不会作为传统的东西而被提倡.

sentences.en: the harshest possible sanction which could be imposed
sentences.cn: 可能采取的最严厉的处罚

sentences.en: The king could not enact laws without the sanction of Parliament.
sentences.cn: 未经议会批准，国王不能制定法律。

sentences.en: The said proposal has received the sanction and approval of this Association.
sentences.cn: 上述的提案得到协会的批准和赞同.

sentences.en: the threat of trade sanctions
sentences.cn: 贸易制裁的威胁

sentences.en: The UN security council may impose economic sanctions .
sentences.cn: 联合国安理会可能会实施经济制裁。

sentences.en: We have the sanction of the law to play ball in this park.
sentences.cn: 法律准许我们在这个公园里打球.

sentences.en: We need the sanction of the law to hunt in this place.
sentences.cn: 我们在这地方打猎需要有法律的许可.

sentences.en: Would you sanction flogging as a punishment for crimes of violence?
sentences.cn: 你赞许鞭打作为对暴力罪行的一种处罚 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 认可的，批准的；神圣化的
使圣洁；使神圣化；把…奉献给神；认可

trans.tran_cn: 制裁，处罚，批准，认可，约束力，鼓励
trans.tran_en: official orders or laws stopping trade, communication etc with another country, as a way of forcing its leaders to make political changes
official orders or laws stopping trade, communication etc with another country, as a way of forcing its leaders to make political changes
to officially accept or allow something
to officially accept or allow something
